WirelessProtocol
WirelessProtocol

Class containing protocol information for a device.

Types
CommandID

The Wireless command IDs.

cmdId_basePing_v1

0x01  - Ping Base Station (v1)

cmdId_basePing_v2

0x0001  - Ping Base Station (v2)

cmdId_shortPing_v1

0x02  - Short Ping (v1)

cmdId_longPing_v1

0x0002  - Long Ping (v1)

cmdId_readSingleSensor

0x03  - Read Single Sensor

cmdId_readEeprom_v1

0x0003  - Read Eeprom (v1)

cmdId_writeEeprom_v1

0x0004  - Write Eeprom (v1)

cmdId_pageDownload

0x05  - Page Download

cmdId_erase

0x06  - Erase (v1)

cmdId_writeEeprom_v2

0x0008  - Write Eeprom (v2)

cmdId_getDiagInfo_v1

0x0009  - Get Diagnostic Info (v1)

cmdId_batchEepromRead

0x000A  - Batch EEPROM Read

cmdId_armForDatalog

0x000D  - Arm for Datalogging

cmdId_triggerArmedLog

0x000E  - Trigger Armed Datalogging

cmdId_shortPing_v2

0x0012  - Short Ping (v2)

cmdId_testNodeCommProtocol

0x0013  - Test Node Communication Protocol

cmdId_baseReset_v2

0x0030  - Base Station Reset (v2)

cmdId_reset_v2

0x0031  - Reset (v2)

cmdId_sleep

0x0032  - Sleep (v1)

cmdId_startStreaming

0x38  - Start Streaming

cmdId_startLdc_v1

0x0038  - Start Low Duty Cycle (v1)

cmdId_startLdc_v2

0x0039  - Start Low Duty Cycle (v2)

cmdId_startSync_v1

0x003B  - Start Sync Sampling (v1)

cmdId_logSessionInfo_v1

0x0040  - Get the Logged Session Info (v1)

cmdId_getLogData_v1

0x0041  - Get Logged Data (v1)

cmdId_erase_v2

0x0042  - Erase Logged Data (v2)

cmdId_autoBalance_v1

0x62  - Auto Balance (v1)

cmdId_autoCal_v1

0x0064  - Auto Calibrate (v1)

cmdId_autoBalance_v2

0x0065  - Auto Balance (v2)

cmdId_base_readEeprom_v1

0x73  - Read Base Station Eeprom (v1)

cmdId_base_readEeprom_v2

0x0073  - Read Base Station Eeprom (v2)

cmdId_base_readEeprom_v3

0x0073  - Read Base Station Eeprom (v3)

cmdId_base_writeEeprom_v1

0x78  - Write Base Station Eeprom (v1)

cmdId_base_writeEeprom_v2

0x0078  - Write Base Station Eeprom (v2)

cmdId_base_writeEeprom_v3

0x0078  - Write Base Station Eeprom (v3)

cmdId_stopNode

0x0090  - Set Node to Idle (v1)

cmdId_stopNode_v2

0x0091  - Set Node to Idle (v2)

cmdId_base_rfScan_v1

0x00ED  - Base Station Rf Energy Frequency Scan (v1)

cmdId_base_setBeaconTime

0xBEAB  - Base Station Set Beacon Timestamp

cmdId_base_setBeacon_v1

0xBEAC  - Base Station Enable/Disable Beacon (v1)

cmdId_base_setBeacon_v2

0xBEAC  - Base Station Enable/Disable Beacon (v2)

cmdId_base_getBeaconStatus_v1

0xBEAD  - Base Station Get Beacon Status (v1)

cmdId_poll

0xDA7A  - Poll (v1)
